description:
8.114 surround
Apply audio surround upmix filter.

This filter allows to produce multichannel output from audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: surround

parameters.description:
Set output channel layout. By default, this is 5.1.

See (ffmpeg-utils)the Channel Layout section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the required syntax.
parameters.name: chl_out

parameters.description:
Set input channel layout. By default, this is stereo.

See (ffmpeg-utils)the Channel Layout section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the required syntax.
parameters.name: chl_in

parameters.description: Set input volume level. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: level_in

parameters.description: Set output volume level. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: level_out

parameters.description: Enable LFE channel output if output channel layout has it. By default, this is enabled.
parameters.name: lfe

parameters.description: Set LFE low cut off frequency. By default, this is 128 Hz.
parameters.name: lfe_low

parameters.description: Set LFE high cut off frequency. By default, this is 256 Hz.
parameters.name: lfe_high

parameters.description: Set LFE mode, can be add or sub. Default is add. In add mode, LFE channel is created from input audio and added to output. In sub mode, LFE channel is created from input audio and added to output but also all non-LFE output channels are subtracted with output LFE channel.
parameters.name: lfe_mode

parameters.description: Set temporal smoothness strength, used to gradually change factors when transforming stereo sound in time. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Useful to improve output quality with focus option values greater than 0.0. Default is 0.0. Only values inside this range and without edges are effective.
parameters.name: smooth

parameters.description: Set angle of stereo surround transform, Allowed range is from 0 to 360. Default is 90.
parameters.name: angle

parameters.description: Set focus of stereo surround transform, Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default is 0.
parameters.name: focus

parameters.description: Set front center input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: fc_in

parameters.description: Set front center output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: fc_out

parameters.description: Set front left input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: fl_in

parameters.description: Set front left output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: fl_out

parameters.description: Set front right input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: fr_in

parameters.description: Set front right output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: fr_out

parameters.description: Set side left input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: sl_in

parameters.description: Set side left output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: sl_out

parameters.description: Set side right input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: sr_in

parameters.description: Set side right output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: sr_out

parameters.description: Set back left input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: bl_in

parameters.description: Set back left output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: bl_out

parameters.description: Set back right input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: br_in

parameters.description: Set back right output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: br_out

parameters.description: Set back center input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: bc_in

parameters.description: Set back center output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: bc_out

parameters.description: Set LFE input volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: lfe_in

parameters.description: Set LFE output volume. By default, this is 1.
parameters.name: lfe_out

parameters.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for all channels. Allowed range is from -1 to 15. By default this value is negative -1, and thus unused.
parameters.name: allx

parameters.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for all channels. Allowed range is from -1 to 15. By default this value is negative -1, and thus unused.
parameters.name: ally

parameters.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
parameters.name: fcx, flx, frx, blx, brx, slx, srx, bcx

parameters.description: Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.
parameters.name: fcy, fly, fry, bly, bry, sly, sry, bcy

parameters.description: Set window size. Allowed range is from 1024 to 65536. Default size is 4096.
parameters.name: win_size

parameters.description:
Set window function.

It accepts the following values:

‘rect’
‘bartlett’
‘hann, hanning’
‘hamming’
‘blackman’
‘welch’
‘flattop’
‘bharris’
‘bnuttall’
‘bhann’
‘sine’
‘nuttall’
‘lanczos’
‘gauss’
‘tukey’
‘dolph’
‘cauchy’
‘parzen’
‘poisson’
‘bohman’
‘kaiser’

Default is hann.
parameters.name: win_func

parameters.description: Set window overlap. If set to 1, the recommended overlap for selected window function will be picked. Default is 0.5.
parameters.name: overlap

source:
8.114 surround

Apply audio surround upmix filter.

This filter allows to produce multichannel output from audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

chl_out

Set output channel layout. By default, this is 5.1.

See (ffmpeg-utils)the Channel Layout section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the required syntax.

chl_in

Set input channel layout. By default, this is stereo.

See (ffmpeg-utils)the Channel Layout section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the required syntax.

level_in

Set input volume level. By default, this is 1.

level_out

Set output volume level. By default, this is 1.

lfe

Enable LFE channel output if output channel layout has it. By default, this is enabled.

lfe_low

Set LFE low cut off frequency. By default, this is 128 Hz.

lfe_high

Set LFE high cut off frequency. By default, this is 256 Hz.

lfe_mode

Set LFE mode, can be add or sub. Default is add. In add mode, LFE channel is created from input audio and added to output. In sub mode, LFE channel is created from input audio and added to output but also all non-LFE output channels are subtracted with output LFE channel.

smooth

Set temporal smoothness strength, used to gradually change factors when transforming stereo sound in time. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Useful to improve output quality with focus option values greater than 0.0. Default is 0.0. Only values inside this range and without edges are effective.

angle

Set angle of stereo surround transform, Allowed range is from 0 to 360. Default is 90.

focus

Set focus of stereo surround transform, Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default is 0.

fc_in

Set front center input volume. By default, this is 1.

fc_out

Set front center output volume. By default, this is 1.

fl_in

Set front left input volume. By default, this is 1.

fl_out

Set front left output volume. By default, this is 1.

fr_in

Set front right input volume. By default, this is 1.

fr_out

Set front right output volume. By default, this is 1.

sl_in

Set side left input volume. By default, this is 1.

sl_out

Set side left output volume. By default, this is 1.

sr_in

Set side right input volume. By default, this is 1.

sr_out

Set side right output volume. By default, this is 1.

bl_in

Set back left input volume. By default, this is 1.

bl_out

Set back left output volume. By default, this is 1.

br_in

Set back right input volume. By default, this is 1.

br_out

Set back right output volume. By default, this is 1.

bc_in

Set back center input volume. By default, this is 1.

bc_out

Set back center output volume. By default, this is 1.

lfe_in

Set LFE input volume. By default, this is 1.

lfe_out

Set LFE output volume. By default, this is 1.

allx

Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for all channels. Allowed range is from -1 to 15. By default this value is negative -1, and thus unused.

ally

Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for all channels. Allowed range is from -1 to 15. By default this value is negative -1, and thus unused.

fcx, flx, frx, blx, brx, slx, srx, bcx

Set spread usage of stereo image across X axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.

fcy, fly, fry, bly, bry, sly, sry, bcy

Set spread usage of stereo image across Y axis for each channel. Allowed range is from 0.06 to 15. By default this value is 0.5.

win_size

Set window size. Allowed range is from 1024 to 65536. Default size is 4096.

win_func

Set window function.

It accepts the following values:

‘rect’
‘bartlett’
‘hann, hanning’
‘hamming’
‘blackman’
‘welch’
‘flattop’
‘bharris’
‘bnuttall’
‘bhann’
‘sine’
‘nuttall’
‘lanczos’
‘gauss’
‘tukey’
‘dolph’
‘cauchy’
‘parzen’
‘poisson’
‘bohman’
‘kaiser’

Default is hann.

overlap

Set window overlap. If set to 1, the recommended overlap for selected window function will be picked. Default is 0.5.
